channel.title: [317][SoulPkerz]How do I change a weapon from melee to ranged?
channel.description:
My server currently has models and gfx for morrigan javelins and thrownaxes; however, they are both melee weapons.
How can I change them to become ranged weapons and have the normal ranged attacks (accurate, rapid, longrange)?
Thanks,
d.v.c

item.title: [317][SoulPkerz]How do I change a weapon from melee to ranged?
item.dc:creator: @d.v.c d.v.c
item.description:
@d.v.c wrote:

Rune knives are also melee weapons in this source, so I really need to find out how to change them to ranged.

Thanks,

d.v.c

Read full topic
